converse.line: Welcome, Emere! What can I do for you?

choice.line: Well, Arlo the hardware specialist has a few things in stock...

I've got some new smartphones, some from Lemon and Humanoid. I've also got lots of computer parts; I got a shipment just this morning of a new type of graphics card. Other than that, I'm selling headphones, laptops, peripherals, and tablets. Can I interest you in any?
Okay, but if you purchase anything, purchase it from my side of the store, will you? I'm competing with my brother. Whoever gets the most customers gets to eat a feast paid by the loser.
Don't do it, Emere. I sell better stuff.
That's not even close to true! Emere, you'll buy from me, right?
I'm not taking sides. If I buy, it will be from both of you.
He's the same as always. He doesn't get out much, you know? He's a bit too awkward as well.
You're talking as if I can't hear you.
You've got a nice place here.
Thanks! It was bought with the money my brother and I saved up from years of mining coal in the mines of Yarl.
It just goes to show you that hard work can really pay off.

converse.line: I've got a waiver for a free... what's it called? Mai HiMorph 430?
What!? We don't offer waivers. And I don't think I've heard of that model before. Let me see it...
Whoa! This is from Pierre! His company is the developer for the GTX series. If it's from him, I'll gladly give you one. He'll just have to pay me back.
What's this about you giving out stuff for free?
Were you listening? Pierre's going to pay me back. Sorry for making you listen to us babble, Emere. Here's your hardware.
